head.title: Home - Jewell School District 8

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.h1:
Jewell School District 8
Competing globally, Contributing locally, Creating unlimited possibilities

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

span.style: font-size: 32px;

line-height: 200%; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);
font-family: Arial; font-size: 48px;
font-family: Arial; font-size: 48px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

br.span:
04/08/20:
As per Gov. Brown's announcement, Jewell School will remain closed through the remainder of the school year. We will continue to send home packets and meals.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: Dear Jewell School Families and Students,

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: Monday, March 30, 2020 will be the last day for daily meal deliveries. Starting on Tuesday, March 31, 2020, Jewell School will be delivering meals and supplemental education packets on Tuesdays and Thursdays only. The new meal and supplemental education packet deliveries will be as follows:

span.style: font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

line-height: 200%; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: All packet and meal deliveries will be delivered to your homes and not to bus stops.

span.style: font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

line-height: 200%; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: On Tuesdays, Jewell School will deliver meals and student work packets to be completed on Tuesday and Wednesday.

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: On Thursdays, Jewell School will deliver meals and student work packets to be completed on Thursday, Friday and the following Monday.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: Jewell School will pick up completed student work packets on the next meal and packet delivery day. For example, if a packet was delivered on a Tuesday, the completed packet would be picked up two days later, on Thursday when the new packet is delivered.

span.style: font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: When a completed packet is returned to teachers, they will give students feedback on their work. The reviewed packet will be returned a week after the packet was originally delivered. For example, if packet 1 is delivered to students on Tuesday, March 31, completed and returned to teachers on April 2, the reviewed packet will be returned to students with the April 7 delivery.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: PLEASE be aware that there will be no meal or student work packet delivery on Monday, Wednesday or Friday of each week.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: At this time, deliveries will be made between 11AM and 1PM.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: These deliveries will be from the Jewell School (white) vans, NOT the yellow school buses.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.span: To make this a speedy process, please do not ask the delivery staff questions regarding homework packets. Please contact teachers with any questions you have concerning their specific packets. If you or your family have inquiries, please call the school at (503) 755-2451.

span.style: font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 32px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

img.style: text-align: center; left: 508.25px; top: 1627.98px; width: 516px; height: 136.5px;

span.style: font-size: 13px;

p.span: Jewell School is the heart and center of the Jewell community; a community deeply invested in its pioneer and logging roots. A fiercely strong and independent spirit was born of those roots and continues forward to this day. The majority of the people who fill the halls of our school carry with them a character and disposition that is uniquely rural. Our community is ever changing and growing with an eye toward the future. It is within the unique context, tradition and heritage of our people that the following vision be interpreted.

a.title: Last Day for Students - Noon Release
